means: 随和的，好交际的，友善的

sentence.Network_en: She's a sociable child who'll talk to anyone.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个合群的孩子，跟谁都有话说。

sentence.Network_en: Roger is a very sociable person.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗杰是个非常好交际的人.

sentence.Network_en: The Smiths are a sociable family.
sentence.Network_cn: 史密斯一家人很好交际.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... smart 精明的 sociable 好交际的 spirited 生气勃勃的.
想起一个独特一些的女生的英文名~_百度知道 ... Superior 出色的 Sociable 友善的 Yogi 神人.
如何用英语描述自己的性格？ ... shrewd 世故或精明的 sociable 善交际的 talkative 多话的.
商志3147词汇部分 - 豆丁网 ... quiet v. 使安静；平息下来 sociable a. 社交的，增进友谊的 nerve n. 神经；勇气，胆量.

list.abs: Shunning the society of others ; not sociable ., 厌恶社交的避免与别人交往的 ; 不爱社交的.
Usenet is a sociable place , so naturally there's a great deal of socializing going on in the soc hierarchy .Usenet是一个社交的场所，因此很自然，在这里有大量社交性话题。
prejudice and misunderstanding 偏见和误解promote sociability 促进社会交往sample local culture 领略当地文化
sociability 社交性sociability rating 社交能力评等social acceptability 社交能力

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French, or from Latin sociabilis, from sociare 'unite', from socius 'companion'

entry.tran: 友善的;喜欢交际的;随和的;平易近人的
entry.def: Sociable people are friendly and enjoy talking to other people.

example.ex: She was, and remained, extremely sociable, enjoying dancing, golf, tennis, skating and bicycling...
example.tran: 她从过去到现在一直非常热衷于交际，喜欢跳舞、打高尔夫球、打网球、溜冰、骑自行车。

example.ex: Some children have more sociable personalities than others.
example.tran: 有些孩子比其他孩子更善于交际。

means.word_mean: 1. a party of people assembled to promote sociability and communal activity
1. inclined to or conducive to companionship with others;

auth_sentence.content: He is a very sociable man, very friendly.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is a very sociable man, very friendly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is a very sociable man, very friendly.

auth_sentence.content: It is a trusting, sociable and active bird.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a trusting, sociable and active bird.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a trusting, sociable and active bird.

auth_sentence.content: Sorry I had to be sociable for a while.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sorry I had to be sociable for a while.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sorry I had to be sociable for a while.

stems_affixes.type_exp: = companion,表示"同伴[引申为社团,社会]",

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好交际的,友好的,合群的
stems_affixes.word_buile: soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+able能……的→adj.好交际的,友好的,合群的
soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+al……的→adj.社会的;交际的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 联盟,协会,社团;交往,联合;联想
stems_affixes.word_buile: associate[v.联合,结合]+ion表名词→n.联盟,协会,社团;交往,联合;联想
social[adj.社会的;交际的]+ism主义→n.社会主义
social[adj.社会的;交际的]+ity表名词→n.社交,交际,社会性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 社会;社团,协会,社;社交界,上流社会
stems_affixes.word_buile: soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ety表名词→n.社会;社团,协会,社;社交界,上流社会
soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ology学科→n.社会学
as加强+soci社团+ate表动词→结成团队→联合
con共同+soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ate使……→成为共同的社会
dis分开+soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ate表动词→伙伴分开,分离

Sentence.sentence: F) For sociable souls, meeting new people by staying in their homes is part of the charm.
Sharing appeals to the sociable in that they can meet new people
Being sociable looks like a good way to add years to your life.
